title: Create an Audience Persona
description: A strategist needs to create a detailed persona for the brand's primary target customer.

tasks.description: Synthesize data from surveys, analytics, and market research about the target audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all available data about the target customer.

tasks.description: Create a persona document that includes a fictional name, photo, demographics, goals, and pain points.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed, empathetic representation of the target customer.

tasks.description: Share the persona document with the marketing and creative teams to ensure everyone is aligned.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent distributes the persona for team-wide use.
